name: AiPrise
headline: Global KYC and KYB Platform
description: AiPrise allows fintech companies to integrate with multiple identity vendors through a single platform. Companies like Amal Invest use us to integrate with local vendors and comply with regulations in over 100 countries.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:b2b; industry:identity; industry:compliance; industry:regtech; location:san-francisco-bay-area
generated_description:
**AiPrise: Simplifying Global Compliance** 

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's S22 batch, AiPrise is an innovative startup that aims to streamline the KYC (Know Your Customer) and KYB (Know Your Business) processes for fintech companies. Located in Santa Clara, CA, the company has a tight-knit team of 14 people and is headed by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. 

At its core, AiPrise serves as a global platform that allows fintech companies to connect with multiple identity vendors through a single integration point. This is exceptionally useful for businesses like Amal Invest, enabling them to comply with local regulations in over 100 countries. The efficiency gained through AiPrise’s solution helps companies expand globally without the usual hassles associated with compliance and identity verification.

What AiPrise provides is a powerful API that connects businesses to local identity verification vendors, significantly reducing the complexity of onboarding both customers and corporate clients. With over 500 million verifiable businesses and 5 billion verified users across 200 countries, AiPrise covers a vast landscape, making it easier for companies to manage risk while ensuring compliance.

Their service range extensively covers various use cases, from simple identity checks to more complex business verifications. Whether it’s using a selfie and ID number for KYC or validating business registrations globally, AiPrise caters to different operational needs with a focus on customization and flexibility. The platform is designed to integrate fraud protection measures, enhancing the security of risk-based decision-making for businesses.

AiPrise is deepening its impact through partnerships with notable companies (think Comply Advantage and Idology) and aims to help various industries like FinTech, crypto, and marketplaces streamline their compliance processes.

Lastly, the founders and team at AiPrise are committed to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in compliance technology, aiming to set new standards for verification and fraud prevention. If you're looking for a robust partner to simplify your KYC and KYB operations, AiPrise is worth a look.

For more details on their mission and services, visit their [website](https://aiprise.com/).
